resources.string: Thanks for downloading Notefy! Built with love, Notefy was built to simplify the process of noting things down and setting reminders in the form of notifications.
My name\'s Narayana Suri and I design and develop Android apps to simplify things. While I am not coding, I like to watch football, listen to music and play some guitar. :)

Paper is a fast NoSQL-like storage for Java/Kotlin objects on Android with automatic schema migration support.
